text: A secret police force is an agency most often used in dictatorships. It is used to scare people living under a dictatorship into agreeing with the dictator's policies. Not all dictatorships, however, use a secret police force. Fidel Castro's Cuba and Mao Zedong's China were able to maintain a dictatorship without using secret police. ==Historical secret police agencies== Secret police agency Nation Existed from State leader Cheka / OGPU / NKVD / KGB The chronology of the Soviet secret police agencies is very complicated.
